charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Diantha on
a road, talking to a collector.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0300: Could you give me that Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0400:
No... I’m sorry, but I won’t be able to give this
Pokémon to you.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0500:
No matter how many times you ask, my feelings
won’t change...
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0600:
OK then! How about I trade you my treasure—this
Pokémon collection?
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0700:
There’s a lot of rare Pokémon, so it’s worth the
same as Diancie!
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0800:
I’m sure it’ll make your value as a
Trainer skyrocket!
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_0900:
It seems like our mindsets towards Pokémon are
very different...
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_1100:
I cannot forgive people who use Pokémon for their
own benefit.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_1200: You are only thinking about Diancie’s value.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_1400: You have no right to be together with Diancie!
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_0301_1900: That looked like a lot of trouble.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_0401_2000: It was, a bit. What does he think Pokémon are?
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_0402_2300:
I refused his offer, but he wouldn’t leave...so I got
a little angry.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_2400:
This has happened to us before. Many times,
in fact.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_2500:
Some people have approached me and asked for
a trade...
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_2600:
or even started a battle, aiming to take Diancie
away from me.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_2700: I met Diancie when I was in Kalos.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_2800:
Diancie is a Mythical Pokémon, and mine has an
unusual color to it.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_2900: So, wherever we went, we got targeted.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_3000: Oh, I remember! There was this incident!
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_3100:
One day, a famous thief sent us a letter, saying
that they were going to take Diancie...
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_3200:
Together with the police force and detectives, I
fought so hard!
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_3300:
Diancie was almost stolen from me, but we
managed to stop them!
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_0401_3500:
*chuckle* Right? It caused a lot of trouble, but it’s
also a really exciting story.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_0402_3800:
Whether it really happened or not, I’ll leave up to
your imagination.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_3900:
I wonder how Diancie feels about being targeted
like this?
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_4000: A beautiful princess that steals everyone’s heart...
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_4100:
Her presence, overflowing with elegance
and grace.
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_4200: If I ever get the chance to play a princess...
charaepi_ch0158_10_carnet/2301_1201_4300: I might use Diancie as an acting reference.
